title: Exotelcraft latest news!
description:
EXOTELCRAFT - 6.2.0 RELEASE

A new version for Minecraft 1.21.10 has been released that adds a world map using the new Ender Map item, as well as most of the content from 25w14craftmine!

Happy playing!

CHANGES IN: 6.2.0 RELEASE:
- Added an Ender Map. A new item that allows you to see the world map with markers and other features.
- Most of 25w14craftmine has been added, but there are still minor things to fix and add.
- All Exotelcraft chests were added to "c" chest tags.
- The ability to change mod keybinds has been added to the options menu.
- The UI in Bedrock Edition style (OreUI) now has buttons and other components defined in JSON. The new screens will also be defined in JSON ("exotelcraft\ui"). A new death screen has also been added.
- Polish translations have been added for 24w14potato and 25w14craftmine (PL: przetłumaczone przy użyciu AI i poprawione, więc proszę dać znać, jeżeli są błędy).
- Advancements from the April Fools' features are now only enabled if the specific snapshot gamerule is enabled.
- Improved SVG support in Exotelcraft Hub.
- Some small changes.

FIXED BUGS IN: 6.2.0 RELEASE:
- Fixed player rendering in 2D instead of 3D in the hotbar when 3D Shareware v1.34 is enabled. You no longer need to click F5 to fix it.
- The Locator Bar no longer overlaps the hotbar in 3D Shareware v1.34.
- The title in the Fletching Table screen has been fixed in 24w14potato.
- [Affected Multiplayer] Fixed a bug where all players would teleport when one player teleported to another dimension and couldn't exit it.
- If mods modify the rendering of entities and this is not supported in the inventory, entities will render in Mob Trophies instead of causing the game to crash.
- [NeoForge] Exotelcraft fluids should now work correctly.
- Some fixes related to April Fools' features.
- Some small fixes.
